entries.journal_entry_description: Antom suspects that an arms dealer is behind the escalating conflict between Gamma and Tansarii. He wants you to retrieve some files from a computer on Station Gamma that will prove this, then show them to the Rak'qua Fervent.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Take the shuttle service back to Station Gamma.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Access the computer terminal and find the files pointing out the traitors on Tansarii and Gamma.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: That's it! Those files have to convince the Rak'qua Fervent of what is happening here. Go talk to him immediately.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Find the Rak'qua Fervent again and show him the data files. Hopefully they will convince him that the war is beyond reason.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: You seem to have convinced the Rak'qua Fervent. Now return to Antom on Tansarii and give him the files so that he can stop the conflict on his end.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Return to Tansarii Using the Gamma Shuttle
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Antom Moria, the Officer trainer, will await you in the Station Master's Office.
